results.title: The effect of aldosterone blockade in patients with Alport syndrome.
results.text_hl: In this study, we explored the effects of @CHEMICAL_Spironolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013148 @@@SP@@@ on urinary protein excretion in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Nephritis_Hereditary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009394 @@@Alport syndrome@@@ featuring persistent @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ in spite of the long-term use of ACEI (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@) or both ACEI and ARB (@CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@).

citations.NLM: Kaito H, Nozu K, Iijima K, Nakanishi K, Yoshiya K, Kanda K, Przybyslaw Krol R, Yoshikawa N, Matsuo M. The effect of aldosterone blockade in patients with Alport syndrome. Pediatr Nephrol. 2006 Dec;21(12):1824-9. PMID: 17039334
